bibl.title: Five Documents from Roman Fayum
bibl.note: 1. P. Lond. Inv. 1602a. Lease of a date-palm grove. 91. - 2. Inv. 1594. Notification of death. 11 December 117. - 3. Inv. 1578b. Order to divide shore-land. Second / third century. - 4. Inv. 1708b. Acknowledgement of debt of vegetable-seed (?). 23 September 215. - 5. Inv. 1712a + 1573b. Tax receipt. 6 September - n November 237.
bibl.seg: Nikolaos Gonis, Five Documents from Roman Fayum.
